rules_text: {X}{R}{R}, Salvage X, Sacrifice Runepowder Bomb: Wound each creature, then Runepowder Bomb deals 1 damage to each of X target creatures. Destroy target land. Activate only as a sorcery. [i](To salvage X, sacrifice X artifacts. Until the end of your next turn, if a wounded creature would be dealt damage, it’s dealt that much damage plus one instead.)[/i]
